name: tick-md
summary: Multi-agent task coordination using Git-backed Markdown files
description: Coordinate work across human and AI agents using the Tick protocol. Maintain structured task tracking in TICK.md files while enabling natural conversation. Supports CLI and MCP server for programmatic access.
author: Purple Horizons

notes: Editor MCP config changes are optional and require explicit user approval.
Never run tick sync --push without explicit user approval.

orchestrator.description: Coordinates work across multiple agents, assigns tasks, monitors progress

worker.description: Polls for available tasks, works autonomously, follows check-in loop

examples.title: Create and claim a task
examples.code:
tick add "Build user login" --priority high --tags auth,frontend
tick agent register @bot --type bot --roles engineer
tick claim TASK-001 @bot

examples.title: Corrections and recovery
examples.code:
tick reopen TASK-001 @bot
tick undo --dry-run
tick edit TASK-001 --priority urgent --add-tag hotfix

examples.title: Bulk import tasks
examples.code:
tick import tasks.yaml --dry-run
tick import tasks.yaml
